de.weltraumschaf.dht.cmd

Interface Command

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Describable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCommand, Bootstrap, Exit, Help, Inbox, Send, Start, Status, Stop

    public interface Command
extends Describable
    Interface for shell commands. Based on command pattern.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
